title: Swedish cinema classics
creator_credit: Svensk Filmindustri, Swedish Institute and Gardar Sahlberg
brief_description: The great period of Swedish silent cinema - the epoch of Victor Sjostrom and Mauritz Stiller - is remembered in a series of commented sequences from their original works.
